roleset.name: to close down
roleset.note: SHUTTER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'shutter' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from shutter.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: gerund
example.text: However , individuals close to the company insist [0] [*]shuttering the insurance division , a sideline from the company 's core property management business , is n't the beginning of a sale of assets .
example.arg: the insurance division , a sideline from the company 's core property management business ,
